categories.name: Medicine
categories.description: Medical references, guides, and encyclopedias for healthcare information and emergency preparedness.

tiers.name: Essential
tiers.description: Core medical references for first aid, medications, and emergency care. Start here.

resources.title: Medical Library
resources.description: Field and emergency medicine books and guides

resources.title: NHS Medicines A to Z
resources.description: How medicines work, dosages, side effects, and interactions

resources.title: Military Medicine
resources.description: Tactical and field medicine manuals

resources.title: CDC Health Information
resources.description: Disease prevention, travel health, and outbreak information

tiers.name: Standard
tiers.description: Comprehensive medical encyclopedia with detailed health information. Includes everything in Essential.

resources.title: MedlinePlus
resources.description: NIH's consumer health encyclopedia - diseases, conditions, drugs, supplements

tiers.name: Comprehensive
tiers.description: Professional-level medical references and textbooks. Includes everything in Standard.

resources.title: Wikipedia Medicine
resources.description: Curated medical articles from Wikipedia with images

resources.title: LibreTexts Medicine
resources.description: Open-source medical textbooks and educational content

resources.title: LibrePathology
resources.description: Pathology reference for disease identification

categories.name: Survival & Preparedness
categories.description: Emergency preparedness, self-sufficiency, food storage, and practical survival skills.

tiers.name: Essential
tiers.description: Core food preparation and cooking guides. Lightweight text-based resources to get started.

resources.title: Food for Preppers
resources.description: Recipes and techniques for food preservation and preparation

resources.title: FOSS Cooking
resources.description: Quick and easy cooking guides and recipes

resources.title: Based.Cooking
resources.description: Simple, practical recipes from the community

tiers.name: Standard
tiers.description: Video guides for winter survival, bug-out gear, plus gardening and cooking Q&A. Includes Essential.

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Winter Prepping
resources.description: Video guides for winter survival and cold weather emergencies

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Bug Out Roll
resources.description: Essential gear selection for your bug-out bag

resources.title: Gardening Q&A
resources.description: Stack Exchange Q&A for growing your own food

resources.title: Cooking Q&A
resources.description: Stack Exchange Q&A for cooking techniques and food safety

tiers.name: Comprehensive
tiers.description: Full prepper video library plus repair guides and DIY skills. Includes Standard.

resources.title: Urban Prepper
resources.description: Comprehensive urban emergency preparedness video series

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Prepping Food
resources.description: Long-term food storage and survival meal preparation

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Bug Out Concepts
resources.description: Strategies and planning for emergency evacuation

resources.title: Learning Self-Reliance
resources.description: Prepping, survival skills, beekeeping, and homesteading

resources.title: iFixit Repair Guides
resources.description: Step-by-step repair guides for electronics, appliances, and vehicles

resources.title: DIY & Home Improvement Q&A
resources.description: Stack Exchange Q&A for home repairs and construction
